member.summary: Tests whether the MoveTo method throws an exception with invalid input.

member.summary: Tests whether the SetPenColor method updates the pen color correctly with valid input.

member.summary: Tests whether the DrawTo method changes the position correctly.

member.summary: Tests whether a circle is drawn correctly.

member.summary: Tests whether a triangle is drawn correctly.

member.summary: Tests whether the drawing area is cleared correctly.

member.summary: Tests whether the pen position is reset correctly.

member.summary: Tests whether the fill mode is changed correctly.
